scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, warm cinematic color grade with rich amber tones during golden hour, authentic urban lifestyle documentary aesthetic with slight desaturation to emphasize anonymity

Scene Description: Late twenties Mediterranean male with warm olive skin tone, lean athletic build, dressed in charcoal gray wool blazer over crisp white button-down shirt with slim-fit dark indigo jeans and white leather sneakers, walks on busy metropolitan sidewalk surrounded by dense crowd of professionals. His posture is hunched with shoulders rolled forward defensively, hands buried in pockets, face showing uncertainty with furrowed brow and eyes squinting painfully against harsh golden hour sunlight streaming between modern glass office buildings. He blends invisibly into the crowd, just another anonymous face avoiding eye contact. Polished concrete sidewalk reflects warm amber light creating harsh glare. Contemporary street furniture and urban trees in modern planters visible. Traffic of luxury sedans moves in background. Multiple professionals in business casual attire flow around him in both directions, none acknowledging his presence.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Wide establishing shot at eye level, subject positioned in center-right third with crowd filling frame on both sides
Camera motion: Slow dolly tracking alongside subject as he walks forward through crowd, maintaining consistent distance
Lighting: Harsh golden hour sunlight from camera-left creating strong lens flare and glare, long dramatic shadows stretching across sidewalk, high contrast between sun-hit and shadowed areas, warm amber tones dominating with cool blue shadows from buildings
Mood: Anonymous and invisible, uncomfortable in bright light, defensive body language, blending into urban crowd, lost and uncertain

Actions:
- Subject walks forward with shortened stride through crowd (0-2 seconds)
- Squints harder against sunlight, raises hand briefly to shield eyes (2-4 seconds)
- Shoulders hunch further inward as pedestrians brush past without noticing (4-6 seconds)
- Camera holds as he continues forward, still invisible among the crowd (6-8 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Ambient urban soundscape with muted city noise - distant traffic hum, muffled footsteps, indistinct crowd chatter, low-frequency rumble of metropolitan life, slightly hollow and empty feeling, minimal melodic elements suggesting isolation, tempo around 80 BPM, atmospheric pads in minor key creating subtle tension

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style transitioning to premium commercial aesthetic, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, warm cinematic color grade with rich amber golden hour tones intensifying into warm brass and gold highlights, authentic urban lifestyle aesthetic evolving into luxury retail cinematography

Scene Description: Same late twenties Mediterranean male in charcoal blazer, white shirt, and dark jeans pauses on sidewalk directly in front of sleek SunVue flagship store. Floor-to-ceiling glass windows with polished chrome frames reflect golden hour sunlight. Inside window display, gold-frame SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses are positioned on white marble pedestal under dramatic spotlight, creating hero product moment. The iconic double-bridge gold aviators with G-15 gray-green gradient lenses seem to glow with warm brass tones, lenses reflecting crystalline sharp cityscape and setting sun with impossible optical clarity and rainbow prismatic edge effects from anti-reflective coating. Subject's squinting uncertain expression visible in reflection, contrasting with confident allure of the frames. Warm interior boutique lighting spills onto sidewalk. Modern architectural details of store entrance visible - recessed LED strips, floating brushed gold shelves glimpsed through glass, white and gold color scheme.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium shot at eye level, subject positioned left third of frame with store window and illuminated aviators filling right two-thirds, creating visual tension between uncertain subject and confident product
Camera motion: Slow push-in toward window display, gradually making aviators larger and more prominent while subject remains static at frame edge
Lighting: Golden hour sunlight from camera-right hitting both subject and storefront glass creating warm reflections, dramatic spotlight from inside store creating pool of warm brass light on aviators making them appear to glow, lens prismatic rainbow effects catching light, soft warm interior boutique lighting creating inviting glow through glass
Mood: Drawn forward by magnetic pull, curious and hesitant, aspirational longing, the glasses calling to subject with promise of transformation

Actions:
- Subject stops walking and turns head toward store window (0-1 seconds)
- Eyes lock onto the illuminated gold aviators, squint softening slightly (1-3 seconds)
- Takes one small step closer to window, drawn by the glow (3-5 seconds)
- Leans forward slightly, reflection of his uncertain face now visible in store glass beside the confident gleaming frames (5-8 seconds)

visual_effects.name: Innerlight
visual_effects.description: A radiant glow builds from within the lenses, shining through. Feels powerful or magical—perfect for smart glasses or transformations
visual_effects.timing: 2-8 seconds - Building gradually throughout the scene as camera pushes in, emanating from the G-15 lenses with warm brass glow intensifying

visual_effects.name: Luminous Gaze
visual_effects.description: The subject's eyes glow with an otherworldly brilliance through the frames, piercing through the darkness. Enigmatic, radiant, and intense
visual_effects.timing: 5-8 seconds - Subtle reflection of the glowing aviators appearing in subject's squinting eyes, creating visual connection between uncertain gaze and confident frames

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern premium commercial aesthetic with surreal transformation elements, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, warm cinematic color grade that TRANSFORMS mid-scene from desaturated amber tones to vivid crystalline clarity with rich color saturation, luxury retail cinematography with impossible visual effects

Scene Description: Inside SunVue flagship store with sophisticated minimalist design - white marble surfaces, warm brass-toned backlit shelving, large LED-backlit mirror with polished chrome frame. Same late twenties Mediterranean male stands centered before mirror in close-up, charcoal blazer and white shirt visible. His hands slowly raise the gold SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses toward his face. As the iconic double-bridge gold frames with G-15 lenses make contact with his face, IMPOSSIBLE MELT TRANSITION OCCURS: The old blurry, desaturated world visible in the mirror begins to liquefy and drip away through the G-15 lenses like melting watercolor paint, revealing underneath a crystal-sharp, vividly colorful version of reality with enhanced clarity and saturation. His squinting uncertain expression simultaneously transforms - furrowed brow relaxes, jaw becomes more defined with confidence, subtle knowing smile emerges, eyes behind G-15 lenses now appear focused and assured. The mirror reflection shows two realities colliding: melting muted world dripping downward while sharp crystalline golden city becomes visible through the aviator lenses with impossible optical clarity. Warm brass boutique lighting intensifies, white marble gleams brighter, gold frame catches light with rose-gold undertones creating premium glow.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Close-up shot at eye level, subject's face and upper torso filling frame with mirror reflection prominent, tight framing on transformation moment
Camera motion: Static camera with slight slow push-in during transformation to emphasize the moment of change, ending closer on subject's now-confident face
Lighting: Soft warm LED backlighting from mirror creating even glow on subject's face, warm brass-toned ambient boutique lighting, dramatic moment when transformation occurs causing light to appear to intensify and become crisper, gold aviator frames catching light with sparkle effect, anti-reflective rainbow coating visible on G-15 lens edges
Mood: Surreal and hypnotic transformation, impossible visual magic, from uncertainty to unmistakable confidence, visceral moment of clarity and self-realization

Actions:
- Hands raise gold aviators slowly toward face, frames catching light (0-2 seconds)
- Frames make contact with face, arms of aviators sliding over ears (2-3 seconds)
- MELT TRANSITION BEGINS - old desaturated reality liquefies and drips away through lenses like watercolor paint (3-5 seconds)
- Crystal-sharp vivid reality revealed underneath as melting effect completes, facial expression transforms from uncertain to confident with subtle smile emerging (5-7 seconds)
- Final moment holds on transformed confident expression with aviators perfectly positioned, world now in crystalline clarity (7-8 seconds)
scenes.audio_background: Atmospheric tension building with ethereal pads swelling in intensity, sound design element of liquid/melting watercolor texture as transformation occurs - subtle dripping and flowing audio, moment of silence at 3 seconds followed by crystalline chime sound effect suggesting clarity and sharpness, warm brass instrumentation emerging post-transformation with confident mid-tempo beat around 90 BPM, uplifting major key progression, rich harmonic layers suggesting premium quality and self-assurance, cinematic rise and resolution
scenes.audio_dialogue: Narrator (warm, confident male voice with subtle urban edge): The moment everything clicks.

visual_effects.description: The old blurry world liquefies and drips away as glasses go on, revealing crystal clarity. Surreal and hypnotic

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern cinematic documentary style with heightened reality elements, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, vivid warm cinematic color grade with rich golden hour amber tones and crystalline clarity, authentic urban lifestyle aesthetic elevated to aspirational confidence, slow-motion moments creating dramatic impact

Scene Description: Same late twenties Mediterranean male, now completely transformed with magnetic confident presence, strides purposefully out of SunVue flagship store onto busy metropolitan sidewalk wearing iconic gold SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses. His warm olive skin appears luminous in golden hour light, posture now straight with shoulders back and chest open, charcoal blazer sitting perfectly on squared shoulders. The G-15 lenses of his aviators reflect sharp crystalline cityscape, eliminating harsh traffic glare through polarization. As he walks with lengthened deliberate stride and natural arm swing, SYNCHRONIZED SLOW-MOTION EFFECT occurs: Multiple pedestrians' heads turn in perfect unison, drawn magnetically to his transformation - a woman in business suit mid-conversation stops and looks, a man with briefcase turns from opposite direction, a couple walking together both swivel heads simultaneously. Their expressions show intrigue and admiration. Golden hour sunlight creates dramatic rim lighting around transformed subject. GLOWING TRACE EFFECT subtly trails the gold aviator frames as his head turns, leaving brief golden light path showing frame movement. Dense professional crowd now parts slightly around him, acknowledging his presence. Polished concrete reflects amber light, modern glass buildings create urban backdrop, contemporary street furniture visible.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium-wide shot at eye level following subject as he strides from store entrance onto sidewalk, positioned center frame with crowd flanking both sides
Camera motion: Smooth steadicam tracking shot moving with subject's confident forward motion, matching his stride speed, brief moments of slow-motion (50% speed) during synchronized head-turning beats
Lighting: Rich golden hour sunlight from camera-right creating dramatic rim lighting and glow around subject's silhouette, warm amber tones dominating, G-15 aviator lenses showing polarization effect with no harsh glare, soft golden glow emanating subtly from frames, high contrast between sun-hit surfaces and cool shadows
Mood: Triumphant and magnetic, unmistakable confidence, urban icon energy, cinematic slow-motion impact, aspirational transformation complete

Actions:
- Subject strides out of store entrance with purposeful lengthened steps, gold aviators prominent (0-2 seconds)
- SYNCHRONIZED SLOW-MOTION: First pedestrian (woman in business suit) turns head in slow-motion, expression showing intrigue (2-3 seconds)
- SYNCHRONIZED SLOW-MOTION: Second and third pedestrians (man with briefcase, couple walking) turn heads in perfect unison, all looking toward subject (3-5 seconds)
- GLOW TRACE EFFECT: Subject turns head slightly, gold aviator frames leave brief glowing golden trail of movement (5-6 seconds)
- Returns to normal speed, subject continues confident stride as crowd parts around him, acknowledging his magnetic presence (6-8 seconds)

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Premium luxury commercial aesthetic with subtle surreal elements, shot on high-end digital cinema camera with pristine clarity, rich warm cinematic color grade with golden hour amber tones transitioning to dramatic dusk deep blues and warm gold highlights, flagship luxury product cinematography

Scene Description: Modern urban rooftop at golden hour transitioning to dusk, city skyline stretching to horizon with glass skyscrapers reflecting warm amber sunset and beginning to glow with interior lights. Same late twenties Mediterranean male with luminous warm olive skin stands in profile at rooftop edge, iconic gold SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses prominently featured in close-up. Camera focuses tightly on the gold double-bridge aviator frames catching final golden hour light, creating sparkle on polished rose-gold undertones. The G-15 gray-green gradient lenses reflect impossibly crisp and sharp city skyline with mirror-like clarity, showing individual building details and warm amber sky. As camera holds on frames, DIAMOND EFFECT occurs: The gold metal frames begin to subtly shimmer and facet like cut diamonds, edges catching light with prismatic sparkles, suggesting premium luxury positioning and optical perfection. Subject's confident profile visible behind frames with subtle knowing smile. Rooftop features modern minimalist design with polished concrete, contemporary glass railings, ambient LED strip lighting beginning to glow warm as dusk arrives. SunVue logo materializes with elegant animation, followed by tagline "Never Hide" in refined typography.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Extreme close-up transitioning to close-up, starting tight on gold aviator frames then slowly pulling back to reveal subject's confident profile and city backdrop
Camera motion: Slow pull-back from extreme close-up of frames to close-up portrait, smooth and controlled revealing context gradually, ending on hero shot composition
Lighting: Final golden hour sunlight from camera-left creating warm rim light on gold frames and subject's profile, frames catching light with sparkle and prismatic effects, G-15 lenses showing perfect anti-reflective coating with rainbow edges, ambient rooftop LED strips providing subtle warm underglow, city lights beginning to glow creating bokeh background, dramatic contrast between warm gold sunset tones and cool dusk blue shadows
Mood: Triumphant and iconic, luxury premium positioning, confident self-assurance, unmistakable presence, aspirational finale

Actions:
- Extreme close-up holds on gold aviator frames catching golden light, G-15 lenses reflecting crystal-sharp city skyline (0-2 seconds)
- DIAMOND EFFECT BEGINS: Gold frames shimmer and facet like cut diamonds, prismatic sparkles on edges (2-4 seconds)
- Camera slowly pulls back revealing subject's confident profile with subtle smile, frames remaining prominent (4-6 seconds)
- SunVue logo materializes with elegant fade-in animation over city backdrop (6-7 seconds)
- Tagline "Never Hide" appears in refined bold typography beneath logo, final composition holds (7-8 seconds)
